type.1-15: DESERT WORLD - A pitiless planet of searing heat, blowing sand, and sunbaked rock.
type.51-65: JOVIAN WORLD - A massive planet with vast layers of dense gasses surrounding a small rocky core.
type.91-92: SHATTERED WORLD - A world sundered by cataclysmic destruction.
type.16-30: FURNACE WORLD - A planet with relentless volcanic activity, wreathed in fire and ash.
type.66-70: JUNGLE WORLD - A humid, rain-soaked planet which keeps its secrets under a thick canopy of vegetation.
type.93-98: TAINTED WORLD - A foul planet wracked by a poisonous climate and virulent growths.
type.31-35: GRAVE WORLD - A once-thriving world—now a grim monument to a fallen civilization.
type.36-50: ICE WORLD - A rugged, frozen world—locked in an unending winter.
type.71-75: OCEAN WORLD - A planet completely or mostly covered by a boundless ocean.
type.76-90: ROCKY WORLD - A rugged planet scarred by eons of destructive asteroid impacts.
type.99-100: VITAL WORLD - This diverse, lifebearing planet might provide some small measure of hope.
